ISSUE.TITLE: Subcategories load wrong image
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80 all subcategories load wrong image. problem found, PR inbound. The bug is introduced in https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/7289

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7377 Mark the Order.OrderGuid field as unique in the database. Fix on check exists constraint

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix 7453 Update CatalogModelFactory.cs fixes #7453 currently loads parent category picture. Fixes reference so that child category picture is loaded instead of parent.
